testcase.classname: To Test PNC Bank Enrollment Functionality with Invalid details
testcase.system-out: Given User Launches the PNC Bank application................................passed When User clicks on the Sign On button......................................passed And User clicks on the Enroll In Online Banking button......................passed Then Verify that the user is on the enrollment page.........................passed When User selects the SSN radio button and enters the PAN Account Number "123456789".passed And User enters the PAN Account Number "12345678"...........................passed And User selects the PNC Debit Card PIN radio button and enters the PNC debit card pin "090909".passed And User clicks on the next button..........................................passed Then Verify that the application shows an appropriate warning message on the UI.passed

testcase.classname: To Test PNC Bank Enrollment Functionality with Invalid details
